oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lifeguards at Cascade Plunge, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The lifeguards at the Cascade Plunge swimming pool, located at the Tennessee State Fairgrounds, circa the 1960s. This was a very popular pool with two water slides and a 60-foot-tall diving platform that measured 200 x 80. The facility closed in 1975 after 52 years. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Fairgrounds (Nashville, Tenn.)
